titles.title: Enhancing Multi-Class Share Disclosures Act
To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require issuers with a multi-class stock structure to make certain disclosures in any proxy or consent solicitation material, and for other purposes.
Enhancing Multi-Class Share Disclosures Act
Enhancing Multi-Class Stock Disclosures Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 677.

bill.summary:
Enhancing Multi-Class Share Disclosures Act
This bill amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to require an issuer with a multi-class share structure to disclose certain information regarding the voting power of specified persons.
